alert.note: Alert for Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 25 at 10:22AM EST until January 25 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 30, PREVIOUSLY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING, IS NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA FRANKLIN JEFFERSON LEON LIBERTY WAKULLA IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA THOMAS IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA GRADY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALMA, APALACHICOLA, BAY CITY, BEACHTON, BETHEL, BEVERLY, BRADFORDVILLE, BUCK SIDING, CAIRO, CAPEL, CAPITOLA, CAPPS, CARRABELLE, CASA BLANCO, CHAIRES, CHAIRES CROSSROADS, DILLON, DILLS, DRIFTON, ELPINO, FESTUS, FORT GADSDEN, GRADY CO A/P, HILLIARDVILLE, JARROTT, KILLEARN ESTATES, KILLEARN LAKES, MACLAY STATE GARDENS, METCALF, MONCRIEF, MONTICELLO, PASCO, PINE PARK, SOPCHOPPY, ST. MARKS, SWEETWATER, TALLAHASSEE, THOMASVILLE, TILTON, AND WAKULLA SPRINGS.
